data.text: Yona firii apataa no yam bɔɔ Awurade ne Onyankopɔn mpaeɛ sɛ.
Na mekaa sɛ, ‘Wɔapam me afiri wʼanim;
Nsuo a abu afa me so no bɔɔ me hu,
Memem kɔɔ mmepɔ no ase pɛɛ;
“Ɛberɛ a me nkwa resene akɔ no,
“Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho bata ahoni huhuo ho no
Na afei, Awurade hyɛɛ apataa no ma ɔfee Yona too asase so.
